description: Numbers n such that 8*10^n-1 is prime.
comments: Also numbers n such that 7*10^n + 9*R_n is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
links: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 799...99.
Index entries for primes involving repunits
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 11 2000
extensions: More terms from Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Jan 01 2008
a(22)-a(23) from Kamada data by _Robert Price_, Oct 19 2014
